description: React component 'MoviesList' for displaying, editing, and deleting movie entries with real-time updates via Supabase subscriptions.

methods.name: MoviesList()
methods.description: React functional component that manages and displays a list of movies, including inline editing and real-time synchronization.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a movie by ID, updates local state, and handles errors.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Initiates inline editing mode for a selected movie.

methods.name: saveEdit
methods.description: Saves the edited movie title, updates state, and handles errors.
